summary: This texture replaces the old screen blood, making it much larger, and more detailed.
descriptionHtml:
This texture replaces the old screen blood, making it much larger, and more detailed.
There is one small problem, which I aim to fix soon. Sometimes the texture will get cut off when displayed ingame, as the game uses different parts of the image to show onscreen.

To install,
Place the file inside \'...\\Skyrim\\Data\\Textures\\blood\'.
In the \'Data Files\' menu, check \'Load loose files\'.
author: Devvy
